dc:title: Processed PPS values per EU-country from 2012 to 2023
dc:creator: Fabian Hupfeld
dc:subject: PPS values per eu-country
dc:description: This Dataset contains yearly pps values per eu-country from 2012-2023
Column country_code: observed country as a 2 letter isocode
Column pps: indicators of GDP and GDP per capita in PPS as integer
